name: I'm Not Alone –
notes: Previous versions v0.13 to v0.29 were lost in a hard drive crash. This versions had only bug fixes and minor changes between them.

name: Mainasutto
notes: First time the game was renamed to Mainasutto. Pre-Demo 1.

name: Mainasutto
notes: Demo 1. Also known as the Newgrounds Demo. First public release.

name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
notes: GDP 2016 demo. Showcased at the Gamedev Planet 2016 event. First time the game was showcased in public.

name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
notes: Also known as the second tech demo. *The date is an estimate.

name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
notes: These builds were part of the 2017 playtesting phase of the game. They were never released to the public, only via Discord to beta testers.

name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
notes: These builds were for private beta testing. They were never released to the public now showcased in events, just appered in videos.

name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
notes: Small demo for a Publisher. It was released about a year later in TIGSource forums.
